SEARCH
Package boundary

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
boundary.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
The MainMenu class serves as the entry point for the BTO Management System.

This boundary class:

  • Provides the initial login interface
  • Routes users to appropriate specialized menus based on their role
  • Handles user authentication
  • Manages the system's startup process
  • Triggers automatic project publishing
Version:
1.0

      Scanner for reading user input from the console.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu()
      Constructs a new MainMenu.

      Initializes the required manager instances for user and project operations.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the BTO Management System.

      Shows the login menu if no user is logged in, or redirects to the appropriate role-specific menu.

    • showLoginMenu

      private void showLoginMenu()
      Displays the login menu with options to login or exit the system.

      Handles invalid input gracefully and processes user choices.

    • login

      private void login()
      Handles the user login process.

      Validates NRIC format, securely reads the password, authenticates the user, and displays a welcome message on success. Also triggers automatic publishing of eligible BTO projects.

    • readPassword

      private String readPassword()
      Securely reads a password from the user.

      Attempts to use the console for secure password reading (where no characters are displayed), with a fallback for environments where the console is not available.

      Returns:
      The password entered by the user

    • isValidNRIC

      private boolean isValidNRIC(String nric)
      Validates the format of a Singapore NRIC number.

      Checks that the NRIC follows the format: S/T followed by 7 digits and ending with a letter.

      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC format is valid, false otherwise

    • showMainMenu

      private void showMainMenu()
      Directs the user to the appropriate menu based on their role.

      Routes to:

      • HDBManagerMenu for HDB Managers
      • HDBOfficerMenu for HDB Officers
      • ApplicantMenu for Applicants

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for the BTO Management System application.

      Sets up the necessary directory structure and database files before starting the application.

      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used)
